name: Red Monsters
description:
Made For Windows And Mac

This game include deferent levels and dungeon, each level will be harder and hard to challenge.

CONTROLS

Arrow Keys – Movement

A, S, W, D – Movement

 

HOW TO PLAY

Collect all the coins then the teleport door will open to get to next level.

Stay away from monsters and evils.

Don’t get near to wall traps

 

Install instructions

Download & run the executable file.
